body:
Thanks, Greg.  You're very welcome.

I don't think the IANA is set up for frequent updates, but I'll file
the additional platforms, and in a while submit them.  I'd no idea the
type was so widely implemented.  I didn't know Zumtobel Vivaldi even
existed!

Randolph
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] vnd.radiance is now an IANA image media type
subject: [Radiance-general] vnd.radiance is now an IANA image media type
